plot: Tonio is a shy bookseller who often has his head in the clouds. He is secretly in love with a waitress called Julia and wants to sing a song for her at the forthcoming "Stella Radio" ...
title: Kopfkino
plot_es: Tonio is a shy bookseller who often has his head in the clouds. He is secretly in love with a waitress called Julia and wants to sing a song for her at the forthcoming "Stella Radio" ...
